verbs.description: [ARG0: sabres] [V: dump] [ARG1: kings] [ARGM-TMP: 5 - 1 saturday afternoon] [ARGM-LOC: in los angeles] the sabres dumped the la kings 5 - 1 jeff skinner had the hat trick for buffalo drew doughty jonathan quick sabres michael amadio los angeles kings jeff skinner los angeles jason pominville zach bogosian buffalo sabres
